name: raboard
description: Lightweight bulletin board/chat extension backed by a shared UNC folder.

raBoard.shareRoot.description: UNC path to the shared board root.
raBoard.shareRoot.markdownDescription: UNC path to the shared board root (for example `\\mysv01\board`).

raBoard.defaultRoom.markdownDescription: Logical room to join on startup (default `general`).

raBoard.userName.description: Override for the user name reported in presence.
raBoard.userName.markdownDescription: Override for the user name reported in presence. Leave empty to use the OS account name as described in the requirements.

raBoard.pollIntervalMs.description: Polling interval for message updates in milliseconds.
raBoard.pollIntervalMs.markdownDescription: Polling interval for message updates in milliseconds (default 5000ms, minimum 1000ms).

raBoard.presenceTtlSec.description: Seconds before a user is considered offline if presence is stale.
raBoard.presenceTtlSec.markdownDescription: Seconds before a user is considered offline if presence is stale (default 60s, minimum 15s).

raBoard.maxImageMB.description: Maximum inline image size in megabytes before falling back to download links.
raBoard.maxImageMB.markdownDescription: Maximum inline image size in megabytes before falling back to download links (default 10MB).

raBoard.maxInlinePx.description: Maximum rendered image height in pixels.
raBoard.maxInlinePx.markdownDescription: Maximum rendered image height in pixels for inline previews (default 240px).

raBoard.initialLoadLimit.description: Maximum number of recent messages to load when a room opens.
raBoard.initialLoadLimit.markdownDescription: Maximum number of recent messages to load when a room opens (default 200).

raBoard.debug.description: Enable verbose debug logging for raBoard.
raBoard.debug.markdownDescription: Enable verbose debug logging for raBoard. When true, additional metrics are written to the raBoard output channel.

raBoard.notifications.enabled.description: Enable unread notifications for tracked rooms.
raBoard.notifications.enabled.markdownDescription: Enable unread notifications for tracked rooms in the status bar and activity badge.

raBoard.notifications.mode.description: Notification channels to use for unread activity.
raBoard.notifications.mode.markdownDescription: Select which notification channels to use for unread activity (`both`, `toast`, `badge`, or `status`).

raBoard.notifications.rooms.description: Specific rooms to watch for unread notifications.
raBoard.notifications.rooms.markdownDescription: Specific rooms to watch for unread notifications. Leave empty to watch every room you open.

raBoard.notifications.throttleMs.description: Minimum number of milliseconds between toast notifications.
raBoard.notifications.throttleMs.markdownDescription: Minimum number of milliseconds between toast notifications (default 10000ms).

raBoard.notifications.includeActiveRoom.description: Include the currently active room when calculating unread notifications.
raBoard.notifications.includeActiveRoom.markdownDescription: Include the currently active room when calculating unread notifications.

raBoard.notifications.dnd.description: Silence toast notifications (status and badges continue to update).
raBoard.notifications.dnd.markdownDescription: Silence toast notifications while keeping status and badges up to date.

scripts.lint: npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:prettier
scripts.test:integration: echo "Integration tests are not yet implemented"
